paper_abstract: In this paper we focus on fuzzy linear programming problems. The fuzzy linear programming problems will contain fuzzy constraint together with a fuzzy objective function. We use the interval-valued fuzzy sets and the method in Zimmermann [13], to derive a new method to solve the linear programming in the fuzzy sense from the crisp linear programming.
paper_title: FUZZY LINEAR PROGRAMMING BASED ON INTERVAL-VALUED FUZZY SETS
